alert.note: Alert for De Witt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 2:12PM CST until March 11 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations around 2 inches. * WHERE...De Witt County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions to develop late this afternoon or early evening. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute and possibly the early Friday morning commute for untreated roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the Internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com
